title: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina Season 2: What We Know So Far!
author: Think Story
comment: They better not pull a Riverdale and do a risqué musical episode
I’m so excited for season 2 and them having a Salem-centric episode would be awesome.  I hope we also see him in his true demonic form like we did when he first appeared before he turned into a cat.
I really hope they don’t go crazy like Riverdale season 3.
description:
With the release of season/part 2 of Chilling Adventures of Sabrina a month away we take a look at everything we know so far about the upcoming season!
